Khmer Explorer

Why go to Cambodia?

Everyone asks this question. While some countries have certain activities and areas that only can be be optimal for certain people. But Cambodia has many places that will suits many types of holidaymakers, Be it holiday to visit historic areas to shopping trips to foodie heaven, it even has a snow world in its capital city. This country is can leave you speechless with its beauty. The Khmer (Cambodian) people are the kindest and most respectful humans in the world. Their culture and history is fasinating. The Khmer language is complexed but they try to communicate and are delighted when you try to speak to them in their native tongue. If they can speak English, they will try to help you to the best of their ability.

Angkor Wat

A beautiful Hindu-Buddist temple complex built 12th century.

Koh Rong

A special beach with amazing views especially at night.

Royal Palace

Cambodian Royal Palace & Silver Pagoda is breathtaking.

Phnom Pehn Safari

A zoo where you can pay to feed the animals and shows.

Kampot River

A beautiful holiday resort.

Celeste Skybar

Phnom Pehn's popular revolving skybar.

Oudong

Previous capital city, where 3 kings ashes are kept.

Mekong River

Sunset and night cruises availible at the riverside in Phnom Pehn.

Kirirom National Park

A vast area of lakes, forrests and waterfalls.

Koh Norea Bridge

At night the bridge is lit up with the Cambodian flag.

Sunshine Family Park

Power-free amusement park, snow world and night market.

Phnom Tamao

A Wildlife sanctuary for animals from illegal trade.

Map of Cambodia

Please use the google maps below to explore the country


Recommended Apps for use in Cambodia

App's center a big part of life in Cambodia. Be it for phone networks, Transport and food. Now downloading these apps before you leave for your trip, Google Play will warn you about these apps but in country you do not get such warnings. It's because the app makers are connected with China's government, perfect example is TikTok.

Phone Networks


Smart

Top mobile phone network in Cambodia.

Cellcard

Popular mobile phone network in Cambodia.

Metfone

One of the top 3 mobile phone networks in Cambodia.

Transportation


Passapp

Tuktuk, remoqrue and private car booking app. Most popular in the country

WeGO

Taxi booking app.

BookmeBus

Booking app for buses, boats and private cars.

CamboTicket

Booking app for Buses, Ferries, Taxi's and Tours.


Food Delivery


Grab

No.1 food delivery app in Cambodia and taxi service.

Foodpanda

Worldwide known food delivery app.

NHAM24

Food delivery app, which has been purchased by Grab, and will be phased out eventually.

WOWNOW

Food delivery app, which also deals with online shopping and bill paying.


Travel


Cambodian E-visa

Official Cambodian Embassy visa app.

Booking.com

Holiday booking app, which is quite popular.

Kayak

Newest holiday booking app.

Expedia

One of the first of the online holiday booking sites.



Cambodia Live Weather Forcast

Take a look at the weather in the province you would like to visit. Please be aware of the time difference. Also protect yourself with the highest level of sunscreen and check all travel restrictions before booking a trip.


Translator Apps


In the world of translator apps, the Khmer language is not widely used. These are the only two that can be downloaded to your phone which you can learn Khmer and other Asian languages.

Ling

A translating app used for many languages including Khmer.

Simply Learn Cambodian

A translating learning app specifically just Khmer language but can choose other languages.

italki

A translating learning from fluent speakers Khmer language.

Which part of Cambodia, would suit your style of holiday?
